amendment.description: Amendment limits harmless error sentencing claims in Federal courts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that fact-intensive and time-consuming "harmless-error sentencing claims" will be reviewed again in Federal court only if the State court erred in determining that the claim was subject to harmlessness review.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
